summary: App with social/action buttons needs Instagram button updated: remove the "Follow me on Instagram" button and ensure a single Instagram button opens the specified profile URL.
known_issues: Instagram UI currently shows an extra "Follow me on Instagram" button instead of a single button linking to the provided profile URL.

existing_features.title: Ensure the UI shows only one Instagram button, and that it opens exactly: https://www.instagram.com/ae560919?igsh=NHFmdnppNzU4OWVy
Remove the duplicate Instagram entry coming from the profile.links list so it cannot render as an additional "Follow me on Instagram" button for new or existing users.
Update the Instagram button’s user-facing label text to English that does not say “Follow me on Instagram” (e.g., "Instagram").

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the "Follow me on Instagram" button and keep only one Instagram button that opens https://www.instagram.com/ae560919?igsh=NHFmdnppNzU4OWVy

projectName: Remove extra “Follow me on Instagram” and keep a single Instagram button linking to the provided profile
